detaileddescription.para: vCoRoutineSchedule() executes the highest priority co-routine that is able to run. The co-routine will execute until it either blocks, yields or is preempted by a task. Co-routines execute cooperatively so one co-routine cannot be preempted by another, but can be preempted by a task.
If an application comprises of both tasks and co-routines then vCoRoutineSchedule should be called from the idle task (in an idle task hook).
